other_gear: +1 dragonhide breastplate, masterwork heavy wooden shield, masterwork club, masterwork shortspears (3), headband of inspired wisdom +2, holly and mistletoe, spell component pouch, 60 gp

(CL 9th; concentration +14)

5th-animal growth (DC 20), stoneskin, wall of stoneD

4th-dispel magic, freedom of movement, giant vermin, spike stonesD (DC 19)

sections.body:
Before Combat The druid casts barkskin and bull's strength.

During Combat The druid casts wall of stone between his opponents to separate them. On the following rounds, he spontaneously casts summoning spells, bolstering summoned creatures with greater magic fang. He eventually wild shapes into a stegosaurus to enter melee.

Base Statistics Without barkskin and bull's strength, the druid's statistics are

AC 19, touch 10, flat-footed 19

Melee mwk club +8/+3 (1d6+1)

Ranged mwk shortspear +7/+2 (1d6+1)

Str 13

CMB +7

CMD 17

Skills Swim +4.
sections.name: TACTICS

sections.body: Stalking through boiling and sometimes acidic mud pits, these druids have caustic personalities and abilities.

Kiro, the mud shaman of a remote tribe, sees outsiders as a threat to his culture and people. He acquired a green dragonhide breastplate years ago from a trader, but keeps it hidden under cloaks and wraps, ashamed that he had to buy it rather than earn it through combat.
Kiro uses mud pits as traps to entangle his enemies.
A stubborn xenophobe, Kiro does not like speaking with those who are not of his tribe.

special_qualities: nature bond (Earth domain), nature sense, trackless step, wild empathy +10, woodland stride
name: Mud Shaman
skills: Craft (woodworking) +6, Fly +4, Handle Animal +6, Knowledge (geography) +5, Knowledge (nature) +9, Perception +13, Spellcraft +4, Survival +18, Swim +6
combat_gear: potion of cure serious wounds, scroll of lesser restoration, scroll of protection from energy, scroll of wall of fire
